1142.content:
Angie was sitting on the couch, searching through TV channels for something to watch. The house was surprisingly quiet as she was the only person inside. Her husband, George, was partaking in a business trip while her son Max was visiting his relatives. Realizing that nothing was on, she turned off the TV. "What am I going to do now?" She asks herself before letting out a yawn "Maybe a nap is what I need." Walking towards the living room closet, Angie began looking for any kind of blankets. That's when she notices something unusual in the closet.

"What's this?" The Latina woman pulled the unknown object out the closet. After a closer look, it appear to be a sliver air tank. "That's weird. I don't recall buying an air tank." Angie tried to remember as she continued to look at the cylinder object. Very slowly, her eyes wander from the tank itself and towards the black hose. For some reason, she felt something alluring about the air tank. Unknown to Angie, her hands have already grabbed the hose and moving it closer to herself. She let out a surprised gasp once she noticed the metallic nozzle was literally centimeters from her mouth. The startled woman took a few breathers to calm down. Then she look around the living room to make sure she was truly alone. Staring at the nozzle for a few more seconds, she took a gulp, insert it into her mouth, and began opening the tank's value.

Immediately, a powerful air current traveled into Angie's body. Her cheeks puffed up instantly and her eyes were closed as she struggled mightily to contain the air. The poor woman's eyes almost bulged out of her head once the pressure traveled to her...
